articles.author: Saeed Ahmed
articles.title: He Is The Last American Soldier To Leave Afghanistan - NPR
articles.description: U.S. Army Maj. Gen. Chris Donahue was the very last American service member to leave the country Monday. He's commander of the 82nd Airborne Division, XVIII Airborne Corps.
articles.content:
In this handout provided by the U.S. Central Command, U.S. Army Maj. Gen. Chris Donahue, boards a C-17 cargo plane at Hamid Karzai International Airport.
Handout/U.S. Central Command via Getty I
